Useful for subscribing to transactions                    that spend the newly-created UTXO.","_requestID":"The ID of the event request that this notification satisfies. The ID is returned by                    OnDemandSPV.request and should be locally stored by                    any contract that makes more than one request.","_vout":"The length-prefixed output collateral(bytes32).return: Amount of collateral backing the loan (in sats)

params.loans_: The address of the Loans contract

refundableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of refundable collateral backing the loan (in sats)

seizableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of seizable collateral backing the loan (in sats)

params.refundableCollateral_: Amount of refundable collateral to update in sats
params.seizableCollateral_: Amount of seizable collateral to update in sats

spv(bytes32,bytes,bytes,uint256,uint8,ui.details: Handles Bitcoin events that have been validated by the Relay contract (onDemandSpv by Summa)

params._outputIndex: The index of the output in the _vout that triggered                    the notification. Useful for subscribing to transactions                    that spend the newly-created UTXO.
params._requestID: The ID of the event request that this notification satisfies. The ID is returned by                    OnDemandSPV.request and should be locally stored by                    any contract that makes more than one request.
params._vout: The length-prefixed output vector of the bitcoin tx that triggered the notification.

temporaryRefundableCollateral(bytes32).details: Represents the amount of refundable collateral that has been locked and only has 1 confirmation, where 6 confirmations hasn't been received yet
temporaryRefundableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of temporary refundable collateral backing the loan (in sats)

temporarySeizableCollateral(bytes32).details: Represents the amount of seizable collateral that has been locked and only has 1 confirmation, where 6 confirmations hasn't been received yet
temporarySeizableCollateral(bytes32).return: Amount of temporary seizable collateral backing the loan (in sats)

collateral(bytes32).notice: Get the Collateral of a Loan

seizableCollateral(bytes32).notice: Get the Seizable Collateral of a Loan

setCollateral(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Sets current Collateral Amount for a Loan

temporaryRefundableCollateral(bytes32).notice: Get the Temporary Refundable Collateral of a Loan
